Class PrioriWriteLock

  • java.lang.Object
    • PrioriWriteLock
  • public class PrioriWriteLock
extends java.lang.Object
    There is no library for prioritize the writer threads so I implemented this class. If there are any write request ,reader threads should wait for writer threads

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int readers
      reader count
      private int writeRequests
      write request count
      private int writers
      writer count

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PrioriWriteLock()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void ReadLock()
      If there is no writer thread and write request read lock works else , thread waits for other writer threads to finish the jobs
      void ReadUnlock()
      decrease reader count
      void WriteLock()
      It immediately increases writerequest and any reader thread can not take lock and if there is no writer and reader thread it locks.
      void WriteUnlock()
      decrease writer count

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
